column2: if you like the painting so much that you're going to take a picture of it....how about actually LOOK at the painting after you've taken your picture? These people would literally stand there for 10 seconds taking their photo
column3: look at the photo on their camera
column4: and move on to the next painting. What is the point? "Here
column5: look at this albums of amateur digital photographs of paintings I walked by...."
